channel.title: Looking for coders to code my blank server
channel.description: Willing to pay someone to code it for me. But really would appreciate it if you would just help for free

item.title: Looking for coders to code my blank server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“FoHammer, post:6, topic:555356”]If you seen correctly, I barely come onto this site at all. & I was helping him ‘not benefiting myself.’

I already have thanks, though. Read again, it isn’t a service. I CLEARLY stated: “I will teach you everything you need to know, if you get good, you get a spot on the team, and a paycheck.”

I don’t get how this is talking about ‘payments’ but more of a informative statement.
I’ve already helped him.[/quote]
You aren’t the brightest star, are ya?
I made a single (one line) statement to you. The rest of the message was directed to the OP. NOT you.

The OP said they’re "willing to pay someone"
Well, gee, I think that is talking about payments.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for coders to code my blank server

I already have thanks, though. Read again, it isn’t a service. I CLEARLY stated: “I will teach you everything you need to know, if you get good, you get a spot on the team, and a paycheck.”

I’ve already helped him.

item.title: Looking for coders to code my blank server
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“FoHammer, post:4, topic:555356”][quote author=xxlillb58 link=topic=674547.msg4508184#msg4508184 date=1462736716]
Don’t really know much about this I’ve just played them and just now I’m trying to make my own so I was looking for people that could help put me in the right direction to making a decent server for friends and everybody.
[/quote]

Hello! Welcome to the community! Weather you’re actually new to the forum or not, welcome to the programming family.
There is tons of Snippets and Tutorials on how to create a RSPS, you could try googling some, there’s also a bunch here on MoparScape, make sure you use MoparScapes search bar.
Here’s one;

If you are interested I just opened a position in my team, targeting beginner developers, giving someone a chance to learn alot.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


I see you only come to the section when it benefits you.
[hr]

@OP:
Take the time to read the rules of the fourms. Offering payment for a service (or even trying to “hire a programmer”) is against the rules here.
Creating a development team isn’t, but the discussion of payments should be done off-site.

As for helping for free:
You’re more than welcome to post topics here asking for help on issues, but please post as much information as possible about it in order for us to help efficiently.

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for coders to code my blank server

xxlillb58:

Don’t really know much about this I’ve just played them and just now I’m trying to make my own so I was looking for people that could help put me in the right direction to making a decent server for friends and everybody.

Hello! Welcome to the community! Weather you’re actually new to the forum or not, welcome to the programming family.
There is tons of Snippets and Tutorials on how to create a RSPS, you could try googling some, there’s also a bunch here on MoparScape, make sure you use MoparScapes search bar.
Here’s one; https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bStKjEWtZNw

If you are interested I just opened a position in my team, targeting beginner developers, giving someone a chance to learn alot.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
